channel.title: R on Rostrum
channel.description: Recent content in R on Rostrum

item.title: TWO DOGS IN TOILET ELDERLY LADY INVOLVED
item.description: Matt Dray TL;DR Animals get stuck in weird places. Oh, and the sf package in R can be used to convert co-ordinates for interactive mapping. The problem I often work with data that has a column for eastings and a column for northings. Typically I want to convert these to latitude and longitude for interactive mapping using the leaflet package in R.

There appears to be some mismatch in the frequency of digits after the decimal point â€“ could this indicate poor abillity to choose random numbers?
